About Me

Hi, I'm Tobias.

I am a Computer Science student and freelance designer from Italy. I like design, free software, the web and making cool stuff. You can read my Blog, look at my Portfolio, fork my projects on Github, or Email me.

I am currently available for freelance design work. If you need a brand identity, app interface, icon etc. please get in touch.

If you are part of a free software project you can ask me to help you with the design of your project (interface, icon, website, etc.). If your project is cool I am likely to say yes ;)
